amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to provide assistance to Pakistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds be used to provide assistance to Pakistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 338 (Roll no. 519).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 338 (Roll no. 519).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
